raw_text: Rev. Sister MARY CINTHIA A.C. (nee HYACINTH BLOSSOM EMMANUEL) was called to her Eternal Rest on Monday,​ 25th September 2023. Requiem Mass will be held at St. Joseph’s Convent,​ Trincomalee,​ on Wednesday,​ 27th September 2023 at 8.30 a.m. followed by interment at General Cemetery,​ Trincomalee. (Carmel Convent,​ 88,​ Ananda Rajakaruna Mawatha,​ Colombo 10).061087

JAYAKODY – MITHRA (nee RATNAVIRA) Loving wife of the late Rajah,​ dearly beloved mother of Anil,​ Hiran & Terina (Teri),​ mother-in-law of Nilanthi,​ Daisy and Ajith,​ precious grandmother of Manilke,​ Shaani,​ Timothy,​ Dinouk,​ Danushka & Ishan,​ grandmother-in-law of Janelle,​ Dan & Sachinee,​ great grandmother of Zoe & Yara,​ sister of late Saradha,​ Lalitha,​ Shanthi,​ Viola,​ Sherrington,​ Vonita & Sushila. Mithra’s final journey leaves ‘Jayasiri Medura’,​ Meerigama Road,​ Balagalla,​ Divulapitiya at 3.30 p.m. for Cremation at Kotadeniyawa Cemetery at 4.00 p.m. on Thursday,​ 28th September.061271

NETHTHIKUMARA RANJITH SRILAL FONSEKA – Beloved husband of Srimathie (ex UNESCO France),​ much loved father of late Srinath,​ Srinath,​ Srimalie,​ late Srimal and Srilal Junior,​ much loved father-in-law of Gregory Caron and Sam Fernandoz (Australia),​ beloved grandfather of Catherine,​ Charlize and Augustine,​ passed away peacefully in Sri Lanka. Remains lie at “The Respect” Jayarathne Parlour Bauddhaloka Mawatha from 10 a.m. on 26th September and Cremation 5 p.m. at General Cemetery Kanaththa,​ Borella on 27th Setember. 0777683672.061066
